name: TS Marketplace: Woodhead Electric Railway in Blue Scenario Pack 01
detailed_description:
Revisit the lost rails of the Woodhead Line with Seven Hills Simulations’ Woodhead Electric Railway in Blue Scenario Pack 01!

The Woodhead Electric Railway in Blue Scenario Pack 01 consists of 10 Career scenarios for the Woodhead Electric Railway in Blue route, all created using prototypical data and working timetables appropriate to the era portrayed, creating an authentic driving experience as you take control of a multitude of classic diesel and DC electric traction.

Your duties range from express and local passenger, to parcels and cross-Pennine coal, as well as shunting and relocation manoeuvres. All-in-all, Seven Hills Simulations have brought over 9 hours of additional operations to the bygone Woodhead Electric Railway in Blue route.

Also included alongside the scenarios, for both your enjoyment and to increase variety within the scenarios, are a number of reskins based on Woodhead Electric Railway in Blue stock, including:

  • Extra variant of the Class 08, a generic blue version with yellow coupling rods and buffer beams
  • Class 76 loco with old style British Railways ‘roundel’, as carried to the end by 76022
  • Extra GUV variant
  • Ex-Works (clean) version of the HAA hopper wagon

Included Scenarios


  • 01. 1M32 Westbound Diversion
  • 02. 2H78 Last Orders
  • 03. 3E13 Peterborough Parcels
  • 04. 6E33 Eastbound Empties
  • 05. 6M50 Dodworth Delivery
  • 06. 7P01 Works Attention
  • 07. 8E46 Eastbound Mix
  • 08. 8M40 Monks Hall Steel
  • 09. 9J83 Oughty Bridge Coal
  • 10. 9T71 Darfield Main Trip

Please Note: Woodhead Electric Railway in Blue Route Add-On, European Loco & Asset Pack, BR Blue Pack Loco Add-On, BR Class 45 'Peak' Loco Add-On and BDO 60T Unfitted Bogie Bolster Wagon Pack are required, as separate purchases, in order to play the scenarios featured in this add-on.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum for 32-bit:
  • OS: 32-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 4330 3.50 GHz Dual Core or AMD A8 6600K 3.90 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R9 Graphics with 1 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator 2019 User Guide.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended for 32-bit:
  • OS: 32- or 64-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 4690 3.50 GHz Quad Core or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 3.80 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM (maximum possible under 32-bit Windows)/16 GB or Better (For 64-bit Windows)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480 with 4 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: High Performance SSD Recommended with 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator 2019 User Guide.
